titles.title: Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2011
Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2011

To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide 100 percent FMAP under Medicaid for medical assistance provided to Native Hawaiians by a Native Hawaiian health care system or a federally-qualified health center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2011 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide full reimbursement (100% of the federal medical assistance percentage or FMAP) for medical assistance given to a Native Hawaiian through a Native Hawaiian health care system or a federally-qualified health center.
